abstracts.cdata!:
The project would comprise an
            engineering project to replace two pre-Bangladesh
            engineering projects the Dacca Southwest: Engineering
            Project and the Karnafuli-Muhuri Engineering Project, to
            provide technical assistance in preparing the Dacca
            Southwest, Karnafuli, Muhuri, and Comilla-Noakhali water
            control and agriculture development projects. The
            engineering services include planning, prefeasibility and
            feasibility studies and preparation of tender documents and
            final designs for selected works to be proposed for
            construction. The proposed credit would finance the foreign
            exchange costs of the engineering services including costs
            incurred previously under Engineering Credits NO. S-8 and
            No. S-10, net of US$0.05 million repaid by Pakistan to the Association.
